resources.string: Question One: What year was the first Kingdom Hearts released?
Question Two: Which world was not in KH2?
Question Three: Which of the following characters can use the keyblade?
Question Four: Who is Roxas\'s and Axel\'s other best friend?
%1$s/4 - You missed every question. Maybe it\'s time for a replay of the games?
%1$s/4 - You had one correct answer. Might need to explore the side games again!
%1$s/4 - You got half of them. Impressive, with how confusing these games can be storywise. Study up and try again!
%1$s/4 - Oh, so close! You only missed one!
